title: Exploring JavaScript Fundamentals Through Exercises
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of JavaScript programming. Through a series of exercises and challenges, we will cover topics such as variables, data types, functions, control flow, and more. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of JavaScript syntax and be able to write basic programs in this versatile programming language.

meta.title: JavaScript Programming Fundamentals | Quicksort Algorithm
meta.description: Explore the basics of JavaScript programming, including variables, data types, functions, and control flow. Practice coding with the Quicksort algorithm implementation.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, programming, fundamentals, quicksort, algorithm, coding, variables, data types, functions, control flow

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 通过练习探索JavaScript基础
i18n.description: 在这个实验中，我们将探索JavaScript编程的基础。通过一系列练习和挑战，我们将涵盖变量、数据类型、函数、控制流等主题。在本实验结束时，你将对JavaScript语法有扎实的理解，并能够用这种通用的编程语言编写基本程序。

meta.title: JavaScript编程基础 | 快速排序算法
meta.description: 探索JavaScript编程的基础知识，包括变量、数据类型、函数和控制流。使用快速排序算法实现来练习编码。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 编程, 基础, 快速排序, 算法, 编码, 变量, 数据类型, 函数, 控制流

verify.name: 验证已执行的Node命令
verify.hint: 通过在终端/SSH中输入'node'并按回车键，可以运行JavaScript。
